chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.subtitle: About This Release
chapter.para: OpenNMS 1.0.0 and greater represent a huge leap in the maintainability, stability, and reduction of resource usage of the OpenNMS platform. It was largely a rewrite of the code that has been in development for about 2 years, resulting in a considerably cleaner code base that will be easier to manage in the long term.
Please, let us know if you have any problems at all at the OpenNMS Bugzilla page.
